value:
I suppose this outfit must make me
look quite intimidating. The other
Heroes don't often approach me.$k$pI'm not complaining, mind you. It
means I needn't bother with social
niceties, after all.

Being in costume reminds me of a
Nohrian festival I once attended. So
many people, talking and talking...$k$pLooking back on it now, though... I
must admit it wasn't all that bad.

What's this? You'd like some candy?
I suppose there are some things even
a summoner can't summon.$k$pVery well. I shall prepare some candy
for you in the near future.

Would you like to carve a pumpkin
lantern with me? It might be fun—$k$pI mean, it might be more efficient if
we cooperated to complete the task.

It is said that costumes like this one
are worn to frighten thieves so they
won't steal newly harvested crops.$k$pThat...is not my job, however. My
duty is to protect my liege, Corrin.

If you do not hand over some candy, I
will be left with no choice but to play
a very wicked trick on you.$k$pI jest, of course. I've simply come to
greet you, so I chose the traditional
harvest festival style.

Have I been swept up in the spirit
of the festival? How unlike me.

I have proven I can serve my
liege no matter how I am attired.

Hmph. This would not be an issue,
were I wearing my uniform.

Do you truly intend to make me a
monster with this power?

Happy harvest festival! I am Jakob, a
butler from Nohr. For my liege, I'll don
any costume that's required.

Is that you, my liege? Oh, no...
Of course not. It's you. How could
I make such a mistake?$k$pPerhaps it is this costume. I feel as
though I've been a bit off since I
arrived at this castle.$k$pNormally, I would serve only my liege,
Corrin. For some reason, however,
I feel compelled to follow you...$k$pI fight for you, and even care about
your safety. I simply cannot
understand it.$k$pAha! You've played a vicious trick on
me, because I haven't given you any
candy. No? You haven't? Then...$k$pI must have formed some affection for
you myself, without even realizing...$k$pWell, when next we meet, the least I
could do would be to offer you a cup
of tea, I suppose.
ふんっ
それっ
うあっ
You're good...
Trick or treat?
No more of this trickery!
Time to reap the harvest!
Feast upon pumpkin!
I'll haunt you.
Heh heh...
Care for a cup of tea? I've prepared it...with pumpkin.
I am masquerading as a monster drawn from Nohrian legend.
Trick or treat? I have no use for these candy-swapping charades. Or for your trickery.
I would gladly serve sweets to my liege, Corrin. But treats? To children? The nerve.
Believe you me, monsters are not half as ghastly as...people.
Do the people of Askr also cavort around in costumes for the harvest festival?
Was that a pat on the back for a job well done? Or more trickery? Ah, well, even my liege Corrin would... Oh, never you mind.
Indeed.
Round we go.
Trickery, eh?
I wore this at my master's behest.
